allows_female_emperor.description: Returns true if females can become emperor.

always.description: Returns true under all circumstances if set to yes, returns false under all circumstances if set to no.

calc_true_if.description: Returns true if at least amount number of targets within the specified scope match the specified conditions

check_variable.description: Returns true if the specified variable is at least X.

current_age.description: Returns true, if the current age is X.

custom_trigger_tooltip.description: Hides the enclosed condition so that it is still required but cannot be seen by human players and displays the specified tooltip in its place.

empire_of_china_reform_level.description: Returns true, if at least X Empire of China reforms are enacted. Works similar to [i]hre_reform_level[/i]

exists.description: Returns true if country X exists.

had_global_flag.description: Returns true if the global flag X was last set at least Y days ago.

has_changed_nation.description: Returns true if playing as a released vassal.

has_dlc.description: Returns true if the DLC X is enabled.

has_first_revolution_started.description: Returns true if a revolution has happened in the world.

has_game_started.description: Returns true if the game has started.

has_global_flag.description: Returns true if the specified global flag is set.

has_saved_event_target.description: Returns true if the specified event target has been saved.

has_switched_nation.description: Returns true if the player has changed nation by playing as a released vassal.

hidden_trigger.description: Hides the enclosed conditions so that they are still required but cannot be seen by human players.

hre_heretic_religion.description:
Returns true if the specified religion is the opposition religion of the HRE.
Note: No localisation for the negation.

hre_leagues_enabled.description: Returns true religious leagues are enabled.

hre_reform_level.description: Returns true if the Xth imperial reform is enacted.

hre_religion.description: Returns true if the specified religion is the dominant faith of the HRE.

hre_religion_locked.description: Returns true if an official faith of the HRE has been permanently established.

hre_religion_treaty.description: Returns true if the treaty of religious peace in the HRE has been signed.

hre_size.description: Returns true if the HRE contains at least X members.

imperial_influence.description: Returns true if the emperor of the HRE has an imperial authority of at least X.

imperial_mandate.description: Returns true, if the emperor of China has at least X mandate.

ironman.description: Returns true if the ironman mode is enabled

is_imperial_ban_allowed.description:
Returns true if the emperor has a casus belli on occupiers of the Empire.
Note: Enabled/Disabled with Call for Reichsreform.

is_institution_enabled.description: Returns true if the specified institution has been discovered.

is_month.description: Returns true if the current month is at least X (zero based).

is_random_new_world.description: Returns true if playing with a random New World.

is_reformation_center.description: Returns true if the province is a reformation center.

is_religion_enabled.description: Returns true if the specified religion is enabled.

is_variable_equal.description: Returns true if the specified variable is equal to X.

is_year.description: Returns true if the current year is at least X.

normal_or_historical_nations.description: Returns true if game is set to use normal or historical nations.

normal_province_values.description: Returns true if game is set to use normal province values.

num_of_electors.description: Returns true if there are at least X electors of the HRE.

papacy_active.description: Returns true if the papacy is active.

real_day_of_year.description: Returns true, if today is X. Refers to the actual real day (probably takes system time).

real_month_of_year.description: Returns true if the month of the year in reality is at least X (January â‰™ 0)

reform_desire.description: Returns true if the reform desire is at least X%.

religion_years.description: Returns true if the specified religion is enabled for at least X years.

revolution_target_exists.description: Returns true if there is a revolutionary target in the world.

start_date.description: Returns true if the start date of the campaign is X.

started_in.description: Returns true if the start date of the campaign is X or after.

total_number_of_cardinals.description: Returns true if the total number of cardinals is at least X.

variable_arithmetic_trigger.description: Can use variable effects and triggers to compare or change and compare modifier and trigger values. "variable_arithmetic_trigger" sections can include more "variable_arithmetic_trigger" sections. This has to be done for effects such as "change_variable" or effects of "if" sections inside the "variable_arithmetic_trigger", since the game may crash otherwise.
